file_insights.changes_focus: Added Escape key event handling for AlertDialog

patterns_discovered: useEffect for adding and removing event listeners
gotchas_discovered: Need to remove event listener to prevent memory leaks
Check if dialog is open before attaching event listener
Prevent default browser behavior when handling Escape key
recommendations: Consider extracting keyboard event handling into a reusable hook
Ensure all dialogs/modals have consistent keyboard interaction
Test keyboard navigation across different components
